languages.text: В этом драгоценном камне содержится душа безвестного героя расы эльдаров. Псайкеры, осмелившиеся прикоснуться к этой запретной вещи, утверждают, что среди сородичей сей ксенос почитался как миротворец, исцелитель и просветитель, совершивший великие деяния.

This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. Psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.
languages.original_text: В этом драгоценном камне содержится душа безвестного героя расы эльдаров. Псайкеры, осмелившиеся прикоснуться к этой запретной вещи, утверждают, что среди сородичей сей ксенос почитался как миротворец, исцелитель и просветитель, совершивший великие деяния.

traits.locale_text: This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. The psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.

This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. The psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.

This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. Psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.

This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. Psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.

languages.text: Esta gema alberga el alma de un héroe desconocido de la raza Aeldari. Los psíquicos que se han atrevido a tocar este objeto prohibido afirman que el xenos era venerado por su pueblo por ser un pacificador, un sanador y un educador público conocido por sus hazañas.
languages.original_text: This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. Psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.

traits.locale_text: Esta gema alberga el alma de un héroe desconocido de la raza Aeldari. Los psíquicos que se han atrevido a tocar este objeto prohibido afirman que el xenos era venerado por su pueblo por ser un pacificador, un sanador y un educador público conocido por sus hazañas.

languages.text: Cette gemme renferme l'âme d'un héros aeldari inconnu. Les psykers ayant eu le courage de toucher cet objet interdit prétendent que le xénos était vénéré pour ses exploits, ainsi que pour son rôle de garant de la paix, de guérisseur et de précepteur public.
languages.original_text: This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. Psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.

traits.locale_text: Cette gemme renferme l'âme d'un héros aeldari inconnu. Les psykers ayant eu le courage de toucher cet objet interdit prétendent que le xénos était vénéré pour ses exploits, ainsi que pour son rôle de garant de la paix, de guérisseur et de précepteur public.

languages.text: 这颗宝石中封印着不知哪位艾达灵族英雄的灵魂。那些鼓起勇气触摸这件禁物的灵能者声称，那位艾达灵族英雄在族人之中颇负盛名，是位事迹卓著的调停家、治疗师与公共教育家。
languages.original_text: This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. Psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.

traits.locale_text: 这颗宝石中封印着不知哪位艾达灵族英雄的灵魂。那些鼓起勇气触摸这件禁物的灵能者声称，那位艾达灵族英雄在族人之中颇负盛名，是位事迹卓著的调停家、治疗师与公共教育家。

languages.text: この宝石にはアエルダリの無名の英雄の魂が宿っている。この禁断の道具に敢えて触れる勇気を持った異能者たちは、このゼノは彼らの種族の中で、平和を作り、癒しを与え、偉大な行為で有名な公的教育者として崇拝されていたと主張している。
languages.original_text: This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. Psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.

traits.locale_text: この宝石にはアエルダリの無名の英雄の魂が宿っている。この禁断の道具に敢えて触れる勇気を持った異能者たちは、このゼノは彼らの種族の中で、平和を作り、癒しを与え、偉大な行為で有名な公的教育者として崇拝されていたと主張している。

languages.text: Dieser Edelstein trägt die Seele eines unbekannten Helden des Aeldari-Volks in sich. Einige wenige Psioniker haben den Mut aufgebracht, diesen verbotenen Gegenstand anzufassen. Sie berichten, dass der Xenos von seinesgleichen als Friedensmacher, Heiler und öffentlicher Lehrer verehrt wurde und für seine Großtaten bekannt war.
languages.original_text: This gem holds the soul of an unknown hero of the Aeldari race. Psykers who have found the courage to touch this forbidden item claim that the xenos was venerated among their kind as a peacemaker, healer, and public educator famous for great deeds.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Edelstein trägt die Seele eines unbekannten Helden des Aeldari-Volks in sich. Einige wenige Psioniker haben den Mut aufgebracht, diesen verbotenen Gegenstand anzufassen. Sie berichten, dass der Xenos von seinesgleichen als Friedensmacher, Heiler und öffentlicher Lehrer verehrt wurde und für seine Großtaten bekannt war.
